name: Amazonia
description: During September 2018, Vanessa Rosa was invited by the shaman Same Putumi to live in her village, in the Brazilian Amazon, close to Peru. Recently, Same reached out to Vanessa to ask for help: her village was flooded and her plantation lost. Therefore, the artist is trying to publish some new pieces about them, to raise money and donate to Same.   This work uses an AI technique that gives a 3 dimensional effect on images plus a hand drawn snake animation. All the images were made by Vanessa Rosa
